metadata.title: CVE-2022-3042 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in PhoneHub in Google Chrome on Chrome OS prior to105.0.5195.52 allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heapcorruption via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
